data.title: How Good Can It Get?
data.text: Long time favorite watering hole that is locally owned and operated. They have frequent live music performers and is just a great place to go for drinks and friendship. Votes "Best Bar in Chico" numerous times by a local newspaper.

data.title: Perfect pub
data.text: Duffy's is a Chico icon. You can find aging attorneys, Irish musicians, hipsters and the gender confused along with a lot of folks enjoying strong drinks and funky decor. Don't go here if you are seeking J Crew and Ralph Lauren look a likes. Try the best bloody Mary in town.

data.title: Neighborhood Bar
data.text: There are a number of bars in Chico, CA, but I think Duffy's Tavern is the friendliest by far.  Prices are reasonable and in a group we can all hear one another.

data.title: Quaint
data.text: This is a small quaint little bar. Though it is small, it feels inviting. There are many several interesting photos and such all around on the walls. We may go back at some point, but we don't get out that much.
